title: The actor Brandon Victor Dixon Twits for St. Patrick's Day.
subtitle: After attracting Mike Pines to a "Hamilton" music debate, social media users found and shared an ancient tweet from Brandon Victor Dixon.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The actor (Hamilton) (Brandon Victor Dixon) sent a controversial tweet in 2012, which was revealed after a speech on the stage to Vice-President-elect Mike Pines.
